DOC.brief_summary: Determine effect lipoprotein profile high dose concentrated dietary SFA ( saturate fatty acid ) ( MCT ( medium-chain triglyceride ) oil + butter ) combination add coffee . The study conduct RCT healthy adult without cardiometabolic disease condition influence lipoprotein metabolism specific dietary recommendation .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Butter & MCT Oil Lipoproteins - A RCT
DOC.detailed_description: Research Design A prospective randomize control interventional study Methodology /Technical Approach A total 60 subject recruit allow completion study minimum 17 subject per arm . Subjects randomize one two group 1:1 ratio . Recruited subject adult coffee drinker age 18-45 without hyperlipidemia without criterion diabetes pre-diabetes . Subjects baseline weight , waist circumference ( WC ) , blood-pressure ( BP ) measurement obtain . Subjects baseline fast lipid , , CMP , HbA1c , TSH , hsCRP . The subject stratify gender randomize receive one two dietary regimen : 1 ) coffee ( < 50 kcal add creamer/sweetener ) 2 ) coffee butter + medium-chain triglyceride ( MCT ) oil combination ( 2 tbsp . MCT contain 230kcal 28gm fat+ 2 tbsp butter contain 200kcal 22gm fat ) . The drink consume daily 4 week period . Dietary history evaluate via ASA24website ( http : //appliedresearch.cancer.gov/asa24/ ) . At 6 12 week post-consent , baseline lab repeat . The primary outcome change apolipoprotein B group . Secondary outcome include change lipid , WC , BP , HbA1c , FBG . Exploratory analysis include change dietary macronutrient load subgroup analysis effect relate dietary pattern . Primary objective : 1 . Evaluate clinically statistically significant change apoB number healthy adult consume coffee butter MCT oil . Secondary objective : 1 . Evaluating change : 1. non-HDL-c 2 . LDL-c 3. triglyceride 4 . BP 5. waist circumference 6 . FBG 7 . HbA1c Exploratory objective : 1 . Change macronutrient profile dietary pattern . Our null hypothesis addition butter medium-chain triglyceride oil propose dos clinically significant effect atherogenic lipoprotein , namely apo lipoprotein B particle ( apoB ) .
DOC.criteria: 1 . DoD healthcare beneficiary 2. willing drink 2 4 cup coffee daily 3. age 18 45 4. serum LDLc < 160 , 5. nonHDLc < 190 6. apoB < 120 1 . BMI > 30kg/m2 < 20kg/m2 waist circumference > 102cm ( male ) 88cm ( female ) 2 . Triglycerides > 150 3 . Hypertension define SBP > 150 , DBP > 90 treatment high blood pressure 4 . Chronic liver disease define clinical history serum AST ALT > 3 time ULN 5 . Kidney disease define GFR < 90 ml/min history nephritic syndrome 6 . Impaired glucose metabolism define HbA1c > 5.6 , FBG > 99 , 2hour OGTT > 139 7 . Any known malignancy 8 . Known malabsorption disorder include inflammatory bowel disease , celiac disease , cystic fibrosis , history gastric bypass 9 . Hypothyroidism per lab evaluation baseline 10 . Pregnancy 11 . Polycystic Ovary Syndrome irregular menstrual period 12 . Subjects take certain medication glucocorticoid , immunosuppressant ( cyclosporine , sirolimus , etc . ) , tamoxifen , androgen , antipsychotic , hydrochlorothiazide , retinoids , betablockers , statin , bile acid sequestrants , niacin , fibrates , ezetimibe , high dose fish oil ( > 1gm/day epa + dha ) , supplement pharmacologic agent know alter lipoprotein . If hormonal contraceptive , lipid panel must stable past 1224 month 13 . Cushing 's syndrome per medical history clinical suspicion 14 . HIV per medical history 15 . Chronic Inflammatory Disorders , limit , SLE , RA , IBD per medical history 16 . History tobacco use within previous 12 month include cigarette , ecigarettes , chew tobacco , cigar , pipe . 17 . History marijuana use within previous 12 month 18 . Active intentional weight loss 5 % past 3 month
